entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
